user_query: My company is hosting a conference and we want to include some fun facts related to the number of attendees. Can you give me a random trivia fact about the number 500? Additionally, I want to include some Chuck Norris jokes to entertain the participants during breaks. Please provide me with a random Chuck Norris joke.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random trivia fact about the number 500.
Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke for entertainment during breaks.
